 Enum defining output type. More...
 

Detailed Description

In addition to the IOCTLs listed above the following common IOCTLs are applicable to this driver.

  • BSP_DRV_IOCTL_DEVICE_VID_ENC

Macro Definition Documentation

#define IOCTL_BSP_SII9022A_GET_DETAILED_CHIP_ID   (BSP_VID_ENC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x1000U)

Query hot plug detect (HPD) for HDMI cable connect or disconnect.

Parameters
cmdArgs[OUT] Bsp_Sii9022aHdmiChipId *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID_SOK on success, else failure. Status= TRUE means cable connected else not connected
#define IOCTL_BSP_SII9022A_GET_PARAMS   (BSP_VID_ENC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x1003U)

Get Configuration in HDMI 9022A.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Bsp_Sii9022aParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_SII9022A_QUERY_HPD   (BSP_VID_ENC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x1001U)

Query Hot Plug Detect status.

Parameters
cmdArgs[OUT] Bsp_Sii9022aHpdParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID_SOK on success, else failure.
#define IOCTL_BSP_SII9022A_SET_PARAMS   (BSP_VID_ENC_IOCTL_BASE + 0x1002U)

Set Configuration in HDMI 9022A.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] const Bsp_Sii9022aParams *
cmdArgsStatus[OUT] NULL
Returns
FVID_SOK on success, else failure.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Bsp_Sii9022AOutputFormat

Enum defining output type.

Enumerator
BSP_SII9022A_HDMI_RGB 

Output format is RGB over HDMI interface

BSP_SII9022A_HDMI_YUV444 

Output format is YUV444 over HDMI interface

BSP_SII9022A_HDMI_YUV422 

Output format is YUV422 over HDMI interface

BSP_SII9022A_DVI_RGB 

Output format is RGB over DVI interface

BSP_SII9022A_MAX_FORMAT 

Max output format
